entry.title: The MacBook Air M1
entry.summary: Introduction I’ve had a 10-core iMac Pro for over 3 years now. It’s a superb machine with a beautiful 27” 5K display. Its thermal design is excellent and even when the fans run, they tend to be pretty silent, unlike the Intel-based MacBook Pro. The machine has been very reliable.
